Posts.EditableText:
So registration has opened for IF Comp 18. Is anyone thinking of submitting a game made in Quest this year? I probably will, but it would be nice to get some other Quest entries in to help it get some more publicity.

Website: [url:2ovfap77]http://www.ifcomp.org[/url:2ovfap77]
